name: Winter in Phoenix
reviews:
What a very specific thing to review! 

Phoenix is one of the few places where you can say with delight, "Winter is Coming...."

The payoff for enduring...

Zonies invade SoCal every summer so it's fitting that we invade Phoenix during winter.
